H1795.def: = process by which something has been deformed or destroyed by heavy pressure

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H4464.def: = a child born out of wedlock or from an unlawful marriage

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6923.def: = action by which humans place themselves in front of individuals or groups, facing either forward or backward, ► and either with good or with evil intentions; ≈ sometimes used figuratively in situations where humans come before God in worship, or where God confronts enemies, or when certain conditions are personified

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H7936.def: = action by which humans make their services available to other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment

H1109.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, from {L:Pethor<SDBH:פְּתֹור>}; ► a non-Israelite prophet or fortune-teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

H6604.def: = town; ◄ north of Mesopotamia; ► home of {L:Balaam<SDBH:בִּלְעָם>}

H763.def: = region, also known as {L:Paddan-Aram<SDBH:פַּדַּן אֲרָם>}; ◄ located in upper {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:אֲרַם נַהֲרַיִם>}, around the great bend of the {L:Euphrates<SDBH:פְּרָת>} River in northern {L:Syria<SDBH:אֲרָם>}; ► ancestral home of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}’s family, homeland of {L:Balaam<SDBH:בִּלְעָם>}, the son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, and the country of {L:Cushan-Rishathaim<SDBH:כּוּשַׁן רִשְׁעָתַיִם>}, the first of the kings who oppressed {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} in the book of Judges ({A:ABD})

H7043.def: = state in which animals and objects have the ability to move or act with speed ◄ due to lack of weight, agility, strength, training, or energy

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H14.def: = state in which someone is willing to do something

H1109.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, from {L:Pethor<SDBH:פְּתֹור>}; ► a non-Israelite prophet or fortune-teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2015.def: = action by which humans turn their body around in order to face a different direction than before

H7045.def: = actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it

H1293.def: = action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H1875.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H1616.def: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H7992.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3915.def: = the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H4264.def: = open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

H2351.def: = referent to the location outside of an object

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H6437.def: = action by which humans or animals turn their body to face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H7364.def: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H8121.def: = celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

H4264.def: = open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

H3489.def: = small, pointed object ► driven into a wall or the ground and used for hanging things on or securing something in place; ≈ associated with firmness and security

H240.def: = set of tools and utensils that nomads usually carry with them

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H6918.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3238.def: = causative action by which humans cause hardship to other humans

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6948.def: = man employed to have sexual intercourse with other people as part of local fertility rites; ► forbidden under Mosaic law

H868.def: = object given in possession to somebody else

H3611.def: = relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a {L:pig<SDBH:חֲזִיר>}; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

H4242.def: = the amount of money expected, required, or given in payment for something

H400.def: = any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H7648.def: = process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H7054.def: = grain as it is growing on the field and awaiting harvesting; it burns easily; people can pluck the ears and eat the grains

H6998.def: = causative action by which humans remove leaves, branches, fruits, or the entire stalk of a plant

H4425.def: = uppermost part ◄ of a grain plant, ► which contains the seeds

H5130.def: = action by which humans hold an object in their hands and move it to and fro, ► probably in order to signal to a deity that the object in their hands is intended for them

H2770.def: = large, curved knife with a short wooden handle (15-20 centimeters); ► used for cutting grain
